name: Makeover Desire - HENSHIN GANBO
description:
◆ Game Overview
Hozui Rio, who secretly expresses herself differently by dressing in cosplay costumes, has been publicly active on the Internet! Please enjoy the visual novel type AVG, Makeover Desire! All characters are over 18 years old.
◆ Intro
The story of the office lady who likes cosplay activity. Various happenings and hot episodes about her cosplay appearing on the Internet. Please enjoy the visual novel type AVG, Makeover Desire!
◆ Story
The office lady, 「Hozui Rio」 is tall and confident in her style, but she doesn't have clothes that fit well with her, even though she wants to be stylish. This, her desire, is always in the middle of her thoughts.
As time goes by, she gradually prefers simple and neat suits for her office work. Even her makeup becomes very simple, and her hairstyle is now short hair. With her appearance, her male teammate makes fun of her for the lack of delicateness as a woman. And her bosses now consider her to be a man-like woman and often recommend her drinking with them together. Maybe it finally makes her give up on decorating herself as a beauty.
... But to her, there is a secret hobby she could NEVER tell her work colleagues.
It's 「Rion」 at the heart of the internet cosplayer community. She makes cosplay costumes herself, and she starts to have passionate fans who like her. This is another hidden look of her. But a new cosplayer rival comes out. That's Kurumin! In fact, 「Kurumin」 is the sister of her other cosplayer friend. But Kurumin quickly gained popularity with her Moe position in the cosplay community.
Our Rion starts to have sexy matches versus with Kurumin at the request of cosplay fans. That competition between them started with Cheongsam (China dress), but it will cause various hot events.
◆ Main Game System
・ Adjust message speed, BGM, SE, and etc.
・ Backlog
・ Window deletion mode
・ Skip function for scenes you have already seen
◆ About This game
・ Videos and screenshots on the store page are part of the content.
・ The story unfolds as you read through the scenario.
・ The story branches by your choices.
・ All characters are over 18 years old.
◆ Store Page Translation by Nyanco Channel.
